title: Ranking Tiers in Company of Heroes 3
description: Based on the player ELO, players are placed into specific Leagues and Tiers.
matchRequirement: A player needs at least 10 matches for each faction in a specific game type to earn a rank and be placed in a tier.
inactivityNote: Note: If a player remains inactive for an extended period, they lose their rank. However, they can regain it by playing just one game.
